kubejs.ponder.antimatter.text_2: Generates antimatter after receiving 1 million zaps.
kubejs.ponder.bee.text_1: Any mob with the tag productivebees:animals will be a food source for the hematophagous bee.
kubejs.ponder.bee.text_2: The Hematophagous bee uses animals as food source.
kubejs.ponder.bee2.text_1: The hematophagous bee will occasionally kill the animal
kubejs.ponder.bee3.header: The Hematophagous and the simulation upgrade.
kubejs.ponder.bee3.text_1: When the hematophagous bee is inside of the hive with a simulation upgrade it will generate honeycombs non-stop.
kubejs.ponder.bee3.text_2: Be sure too have an animal in front of the hive.
kubejs.ponder.mutandis.header: Mutandis and the items it transforms.
kubejs.ponder.section_fading.header: How to summon a Witherstorm for dummies.
kubejs.ponder.section_fading.text_1: Be sure to do this Ritual during a stormy night!
kubejs.ponder.section_fading.text_2: Place all items on Summoning Altar
kubejs.ponder.section_fading.text_4: Activate the Ritual with the Infinity Ingot
kubejs.ponder.tests.header: How to use the neutron collector.
kubejs.ponder.tests.text_2: Generates Piles of neutrons every 3 minutes
